name: 謝金雲
objective: 本科目介紹各種系統軟體之基本觀念、設計、實作方法以及其與硬體架構之關連性。主要內容包括： 1.系統軟體概念與電腦結構 2.組譯器基本概念 3.組譯器之設計與實作 4.載入器與連結器之基本概念 5.載入器與連結器之設計與實作 6.巨集處理器之基本概念 7.巨集處理器之設計與實作 8.編譯器之基本功能 9.編譯器之設計與實作 10.其他系統軟體之介紹。
schedule:
week1:Introduction
week2: Basic assembler functions and features
week3: Assembler design options 
week4: Basic loarder functions and loarder features 
week5: Loader design options 
week6: Implementation examples and midterm 1
week7: Basic macro processor functions 
week8: Macro processor features 
week9: Basic compiler functions 
week10: Machine-dependent compiler features 
week11: Machine-independent compiler features 
week12: Compiler design options 
week13: Implementation examples 
week14: Implementation example and midterm 2
week15: Operations 
week16: Other system software 
week17: Software engineering issues 
week18: Review and final exam
